mapper.sql: id, patentstype, patentsid, patentstime, proposer, inventor, patentsname, stunum, credit, facultynum, majornum, gradenum, stuname, url, responsibility
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from patents
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into patents (id, patentstype, patentsid, patentstime, proposer, inventor, patentsname, stunum, credit, facultynum, majornum, gradenum, stuname, url, responsibility ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{patentstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patentsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patentstime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proposer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inventor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patentsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stunum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{credit,jdbcType=REAL}, #{facultynum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{majornum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gradenum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{responsibility,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

update patents

update patents
patentstype = #{patentstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
patentsid = #{patentsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
patentstime = #{patentstime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
